column1: #Text=" Kuvira says : " It appears we ca n't make a deal right now .
#Text=Are n't you guys going to stick around and help ?
#Text=We 'll wait at the border for one day .
#Text=You get the governor to sign it , and you 'll have all the help you need .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I guess ... I got to go .
#Text=Please , you ca n't turn your back on these people !
#Text=I wan na help , but if the Governor wants us gone , there 's ... there 's nothing I can do .
#Text=" Opal says : " Leave , if that 's what you 're going to do .
#Text=" Kai says : " You know , we might not need their help after all .
#Text=The roads may be impassable , but not the skies .
#Text=We can use Lefty to fly to all the nearby villages , pick up supplies , and fly back .
#Text=" Farmer says : " Sorry we could n't give you more .
#Text=" Opal says : " Every little bit helps .
#Text=Because of you and the other farmers around here , we have more than enough food to feed the town until we can get some reinforcements .
#Text=" Kai says : " So ... you and Bolin doing okay ?
#Text=" Opal says : " I do n't know .
#Text=It 's really tough having a long distance relationship .
#Text=And I ca n't stand that he 's working with Kuvira .
#Text=But it does seem like he found his calling , does n't it ?
#Text=It 's just ... he 's changed a lot since he 's been around her .
#Text=" Opal says : " I just hope we 're not growing apart .
#Text=Speaking of long - distance relationships , how are you and Jinora doing ?
#Text=" Kai says : " Actually , we 're doing fine .
#Text=" Opal says : " We were attacked in mid-air .
#Text=" Kai says : " It might be time to make a tough call .
#Text=" Kai says : " For what it 's worth , I think you made the right decision .
#Text=" Governor says : " Did I ever really have a choice ?
#Text=" Meelo says : " When Korra gets here , I bet she 's not even going to know who I am .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Because Meelo the boy has turned into Meelo the man !
